com.soa.activity
Interface ActivityPerformerRegistry

public interface ActivityPerformerRegistry

Interface for retrieving an ActivityPerformer for a given activity.

Method Summary
 ActivityPerformer getPerformer(java.lang.String processName, java.lang.String activityId)
          Returns the ActivityPerformer for the given process and activity.
 

Method Detail

getPerformer

ActivityPerformer getPerformer(java.lang.String processName,
                               java.lang.String activityId)
Returns the ActivityPerformer for the given process and activity.

Parameters:
processName - Name of the process the activity is for.
activityId - Id of the activity.
Returns:
ActivityPerformer that can perform the specific activity.
